note: Data from international providers and national agencies. Learning outcomes over time should still be interpreted with caution.
title: Share of students at the end of lower-secondary education achieving minimum math proficiency
subtitle: Minimum proficiency for the end of [lower-secondary](#dod:lower-secondary-education) education  is defined as: _"Students demonstrate skills in number sense and computation, basic measurement, reading, interpreting, and constructing graphs, spatial orientation, and number patterns"_.
